generated_body: In the article titled "Taylor Swift Says Scooter Braun, Scott Borchetta Are Blocking Her From Playing Old Hits at AMAs," the user can expect to read about Taylor Swift's ongoing conflicts with her former managers, Scooter Braun and Scott Borchetta, particularly regarding her ability to perform her classic songs at the American Music Awards.
